event.title: 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, La Florida spans

data.event: Its mayor is Rodolfo Carter (UDI) According to the 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, La Florida spans an area of 70.8 km2 (27 sq mi) and has 365,674 inhabitants (176,245 men and 189,429 women).

event.title: is directly elected every four years

data.event: As a commune, La Florida is a third-level administrative division of Chile administered by a municipal council, headed by an alcalde who is directly elected every four years.
